Key Match Events: Fazalhaq Farooqi was named Player of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Providence Stadium, Guyana
The series was the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2024
Others: Ahsan Raza, HDPK Dharmasena, Adrian Holdstock, and Rashid Riaz were the umpires
Andy Pycroft was the match referee
